#include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<math.h>
#include<cmath>
#include<iomanip>
#include<limits.h>
#include<sstream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,c;
        cin>>n>>c;
        int sum = 0;
        int a;
        while(n--)
        {
            cin>>a;
            sum = sum + a;
        }
        if(sum <= c)
            cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
        else cout<<"No"<<endl;
    }
}
